text: Sheraton Oran Hotel and Towers is a luxury five-star hotel in Oran, Algeria, operated by Sheraton. The hotel contains 321 rooms, 39 suites and 1 presidential suite. It contains a banquet centre with 3 ballrooms, each measuring 820 square metres. The hotel is served by Le Ciel d'Oran and El Andalus serving Spanish and Oriental cuisine, Canastal Brasserie and Le pub Bar which serves British Cuisine. == Gallery == File:Sheraton Oran.JPG File:Sheraton oran 8.JPG ==References== ==External links== * Website Category:Hotels in Oran Category:Hotels in Algeria Category:Sheraton hotels Category:Skyscrapers in Algeria Category:Skyscraper hotels Category:Hotels established in 2005 Category:Hotel buildings completed in 2005
title: Sheraton Oran Hotel and Towers
